feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -28.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
